Opportunities

This page contains a list of all currently available opportunities from companies that have partnered with SESH. We will update it as opportunities are released, so remember to check back regularly!

We may also provide more detail on opportunities in our sessions, or tell you about opportunities that may not be able to be listed here - so remember to come along whenever you can!
